channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (far_out)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Florence + The Machine @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:30 — Florence + The Machine at Chase Center. Florence + The Machine is known for their powerful live performances and emotional depth, making this a highly anticipated show.

item.title: Demi Lovato @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-12 03:00 — Demi Lovato at Chase Center. Demi Lovato's tour promises a mix of personal storytelling and strong vocal performances, appealing to a wide audience.

item.title: Meghan Trainor @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-08-09 01:30 — Meghan Trainor at Chase Center. Maggie Lindemann has been gaining traction in the pop scene, and her live shows are noted for their energy and engagement.

item.title: Bad Omens @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-03-28 02:00 — Bad Omens at Oakland Arena. Bad Omens has a strong following in the rock scene, and their live shows are known for their intensity and connection with fans.

item.title: Maggie Lindemann @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-03-21 03:00 — Maggie Lindemann at August Hall. Ariana Grande's tour is expected to be a major event, showcasing her impressive vocal range and stage presence.

item.title: Bob Moses @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-18 02:30 — Bob Moses at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Bob Moses is known for their captivating live performances that blend electronic and rock elements, making this a must-see.

item.description: 2026-10-01 01:30 → 2026-10-02 01:30 — Jack Johnson at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Jack Johnson's laid-back style and connection with fans make his shows a unique experience worth attending.

item.description: 2026-10-16 02:30 → 2026-10-18 02:30 — RUSH at SAP Center at San Jose. RUSH's legacy and the nostalgia factor make their upcoming show a significant event for fans of classic rock.

item.description: 2026-11-19 03:00 — Three Days Grace at SAP Center at San Jose. Three Days Grace continues to draw crowds with their powerful rock anthems and energetic live shows.

item.description: 2026-08-27 01:45 — Train at Shoreline Amphitheatre. Train's nostalgic hits and engaging performances make their shows appealing to a wide audience.

item.title: Father John Misty @ The Castro Theatre
item.description: 2026-03-25 03:00 — Father John Misty at The Castro Theatre. Tycho's atmospheric soundscapes and immersive live shows are a treat for fans of electronic music.

item.description: 2026-08-23 03:00 — The Breeders at The Castro Theatre. Olivia Dean's soulful voice and relatable lyrics create a strong connection with her audience during live shows.

item.description: 2026-04-05 03:00 — Maddox Batson at The Fillmore. Maddox Batson's rising popularity and energetic performances make his show one to watch.
